xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 06 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <puneet> has joined #ccm 04:48 <puneet> hello there 04:50 <puneet_> has joined #ccm 04:51 <puneet_> hi, i wanted to talk about Machine Learning Project (modeling of evolution of tumors) for GSoC 2014. 05:01 <madusan> has joined #ccm 05:02 <madusan> hi 05:30 <prasht63> has joined #ccm 05:32 <prasht63> has left #ccm 05:42 <ayush_jain> has joined #ccm 05:45 <ayush_jain> hi i am from india and i am planning to work on the project "Big Data backend for MedSavant" can any one give more insights about the project 05:54 <pankaj_> has joined #ccm 06:19 <pradeeban> has joined #ccm 06:20 <pradeeban> has left #ccm 07:13 <ayush_jain> has joined #ccm 08:13 <ionel> has joined #ccm 09:01 <ionel> has joined #ccm 10:57 <SayAsh> has joined #ccm 11:20 <IonelPopescu> has joined #ccm 11:23 <fabiocba> has joined #ccm 11:24 <fabiocba> hello 11:26 <fabiocba> I am a brazilian student interested in gsoc 11:26 <fabiocba> and in particular, these two projects "Big Data backend for MedSavant" and "Development of machine learning methods for modeling the evolution of tumors" 11:27 <fabiocba> is there anyone else interested in developing these ideas during this summer? 11:31 <fabiocba> last summer I developed a project using Hadoop at University of Waterloo 11:34 <fabiocba> I was selected as a master candidate here in Brazil and I intend to work with machine learning on big data 11:39 <fabiocba> I am very enthusiastic about ML methods and I also have worked with C++ a lot during my years of under-graduate, so I think these projects match my skills and interests 12:36 <sdumitriu> Hi fabiocba 12:36 <fabiocba> hello sdumitriu 12:36 <sdumitriu> Yes, both projects seem to be very popular 12:37 <fabiocba> ok, but is there anything already defined? 12:38 <sdumitriu> What do you mean by "defined"? 12:40 <fabiocba> maybe a student of yours 12:40 <sdumitriu> Oh, I see 12:41 <sdumitriu> I have no idea, I'm an org admin and a mentor for PhenoTips related projects 12:41 <sdumitriu> I think there is a strong candidate for the MedSavant project, but I don't know about the tumors project 12:42 <sdumitriu> You should contact the mentors by mail, at the contact address listed under each project 12:44 <fabiocba> Ok, great 12:44 <fabiocba> that's what I was looking to know 12:44 <fabiocba> thanks 12:45 <fabiocba> maybe if they already have someone in mind, it's not worth to submit a proposal 12:46 <sdumitriu> Well, they don't have someone specific in mind, the best candidate wins 12:47 <fabiocba> I see 12:47 <sdumitriu> I'm just saying that so far there is a good student, we don't know if you're better or not 12:48 <fabiocba> Ok, thanks sdumitriu 12:48 <sdumitriu> You're welcome 13:40 <vishnu93> has joined #ccm 14:26 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 14:47 <romanalex> has joined #ccm 16:23 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 16:29 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 17:26 <sdumitriu2> has joined #ccm 17:31 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 17:50 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 18:24 <sdumitriu2> has joined #ccm 18:44 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 19:12 <sdumitriu2> has joined #ccm 19:15 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 19:40 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 20:34 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 20:49 <sdumitriu2> has joined #ccm
